trends: There have been 42 other sightings in Lincoln
There was one other sighting in Lincoln on or around July 5th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Red triangle shaped light with orange halo.
divs: sighting detailsat 2:30 am on july 5th i was driving east on holdrege street stopped at traffic light to turn north on 56th street street. looked to my left to make the turn and noticed a brilliant red light to the northeast. i made the turn north and pulled on to a side street one block after turning. the light was a red\orange triangular shape with an orange "doughnut" halo around it. the light although very bright did not emit a glow as would a street light. the object was moving at a steady pace, but much slower than an air plane, to the south west. as the object passed over me it slowed down and came to a stop for about 30 seconds then moved on again to the s.w. it flew for about a few blocks and again stopped for about 15 seconds then climbed higher in altitude and vanished. the object did not have any blinking lights and was completely silent. i would guess the altitude to be about 500 feet. the entire event lasted about 3 minutes in which time i was able to get many photographs of it.
